contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
Hello, it appears that the only way for a form's autoresponder email to include values from the form field, is to create a [custom autoresponder](https://docs.kentico.com/developers-and-admins/digital-marketing-setup/custom-form-autoresponder-emails), which requires marketers to work with developers for something they expect to handle themselves. I'm thinking of Debbie's recent [article](https://www.kentico.com/discover/blog/no-i-dont-want-to-talk-to-it) stating, “I don’t want to talk to IT!”
Is there a low/no-code solution I'm missing to allow marketers to create autoresponder emails that allows using submitted form values?
If not, does anyone know if Kentico has plans to provide such a solution?
Thank you!!
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: 30.4.2
* Link to relevant <https://docs.kentico.com/business-users/digital-marketing/forms/create-and-edit-forms#autoresponders>
